short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to bookmark resources to Talis Aspire Reading Lists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark resources to your Talis Aspire Reading Lists.  This extension can be used instead of the bookmarklet for adding resources to lists.  Every site and resource recognised with the bookmarklet will also be recognised with the extension.
